about_the_game:
Uncover the secrets of the floating island of Vynary and dive into an epic adventure waiting to be explored. VELKYN is an immersive OPEN WORLD adventure with a focus on combat, exploration, and puzzles.

Story

Stranded on a mysterious island with fragmented memories, you embark on an unknown adventure. Guided by the voice of the Ancients, you gradually regain your memories and venture into the sky realm of the floating island Vynary. There, you must confront a sinister power to save what is dear to you.

Dungeons & Trials

Challenging dungeons and a variety of trials will put you to the test. You will encounter various foes — some unbelievably powerful, so beware! Not every challenge requires your sword; sometimes, your intellect is the key.

Items & Equipment

In VELKYN, you will discover various items and equipment. These will assist you on your adventures and can make your life easier in certain situations. Sometimes, these items are also part of a puzzle or help you access previously unexplored places.

Upgrades

Throughout the game, you will be able to upgrade your equipment. Upgrades are not just about higher numbers — some items gain entirely new functionalities! Be creative and discover how to leverage upgrades to your advantage.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon R9 290X or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
